sentences.en: But his heart began its warning thump, thump, thump.
sentences.cn: 可是他的心却开始了那种警告性的猛跳.

sentences.en: Don't say it serves me right or I'll thump you.
sentences.cn: 别说我活该，不然让你尝尝我的拳头。

sentences.en: He felt a thump on his shoulder.
sentences.cn: 他感到有人重重捶了一下他的肩膀。

sentences.en: He gave the table a thump which shook the cups.
sentences.cn: 他捶了一下桌子,杯子被震得跳起来.

sentences.en: He heard his heart thump dully but more quickly.
sentences.cn: 他听见低沉的心跳声，跳动的速度却更快了。

sentences.en: He leaped on to the platform with a thump.
I could feel her heart go thump - thump - thump.
sentences.cn: 我能感觉到她的心在怦怦地跳.

sentences.en: If you don’t shut up, I’m going to thump you!
sentences.cn: 你要是不住嘴，我就揍你！

sentences.en: She thumped the table with her fist.
Suddenly his heart started to thump.
The bass guitar began to thump so loudly that it resonated in my head.
sentences.cn: 低音电吉他开始砰砰作响，巨大的声音一直在我的脑海里回响。

sentences.en: The dog let his head thump on the floor again.
The excitement made her heart thump.
The plank fell on the ground with a thump.
sentences.cn: 砰的一声,木板倒下来了.

sentences.en: The thief hit him a thump on the head.
sentences.cn: 贼在他的头上重击一下.

sentences.en: There was a loud thump as the horse crashed into the van.
sentences.cn: 马撞在货车上发出砰的一声巨响。

sentences.en: We heard a thump as he fell.
sentences.cn: 我们听见他砰的一声倒了下去.

words.tran_cn: 重击；狠打；怦怦地跳；全力支持（thump的ing形式）

trans.tran_cn: 砰的重击声，重击，捶击，（电话中的）电报噪音，[无线]键击噪音
trans.tran_en: the dull sound that is made when something hits a surface
to hit someone very hard with your hand closed

trans.tran_cn: 重击，捶击，步履沉重地走，（心脏等）扑扑地跳，砰地撞到
